<Text: The Seminole are a Native American people originally from Florida.>
Triplets:<The Seminole
1:
--------------------
Text: Seminole:  Today, they principally live in Oklahoma with a minority in Florida, and comprise three federally recognized tribes: the Seminole Tribe of Oklahoma, the Seminole Tribe of Florida, and Miccosukee Tribe of Indians of Florida, as well as independent groups.
Triplets:<Seminole
3:
--------------------
Text: Seminole:  The word "Seminole" is derived from the Creek word "simanó-li", which may be itself be derived from the Spanish word "cimarrón", menaning "runaway" or "wild one".
Triplets:<Seminole
